channel.title: iPhone 4
channel.description:
iPhone 4. [img]https://img541.imageshack.us/img541/3248/zrzutekranu20100607godz.png[/img]
I mean... for real! iPhone 4! iPhone 4 revolutionizes it!

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
technically on topic…

Necessary for the advances it makes, but that won’t stop me being pissed off that my Gen1 Touch won’t get the new OS4…and at the same time they decide to make the updates free? I paid for OS2 and 3

Specific touch users are getting fucked over, and yet iPod videos, far older, still get support? what. the fuck.
.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Orpheon:

Meh, the iphone isn’t amazing but when the 3gs came out they dropped the 3g 8gb price to $99, so it was pretty much the best in its price range for AT&T when I was shopping for a phone. Hopefully this new one will drop the 3gs price to around that level so I can get one to replace my 3g which is going all wonky on me. Oh and I think that they’re finally bringing some HTC Android phones to AT&T soon too, so that would be another tempting alternative. (I am limited to AT&T because my company is paying my phone bill, but so far I’ve had no problems with them.)

They lowered the price on 3gs. 100$

im too poor to buy Apple’s products therefore I have a deep and personal hatred for Steve Jobs and also anyone who can afford Apple, and also feel the need to explain in intricate detail why every product made by Apple sucks and isn’t worth my time or anyone elses.

This is the first time I agree with any of your sentiments

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Seeing as my phone’s broken and I’m using an old Sony Ericsson that is horribly slow and can’t access the net (kinda sucks when I often still expect mails after work), I’m happy with what they announced. And I might pick one up from when they release it in Belgium (guess I can hold out for a month or so).

However, I doubt any changes will have been made to the price. $299 in US = €550 in Belgium for god knows what reason. Had something to do with coupled sales being forbidden in Belgium, but because of the iPhone, they changed that a year or so ago. So who knows, we might actually get relatively cheap iPhones here (or at least half the price the old ones went for).

But yea, proper internet/mail, video conferencing, front-to-back camera, quality camera for video and photo, amazing display (seriously, 326 ppi… that shit’s tight), the iPhone so far has been extremely fast (something that couldn’t be said about the bunch of Android phones I tried recently… the OS felt laggy and chunky), iLife and iWork, fancy looks and sturdier.

If the price is right over here (meaning anything below (or just around) €300), I’ll get one.

Read full topic
